title: FCA to require ‘risk warnings’ on crypto as UK tightens regulation
description:
The U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) announced that from October 1, crypto would be classified as “restricted mass market investments,” a category reserved for higher-risk investment products. Under the new designation, advertisers and crypto firms face a raft of requirements, including promotional material to contain “clear risk warnings,” bans on incentives such as referrals and […]

The post FCA to require ‘risk warnings’ on crypto as UK tightens regulation appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: China’s largest banks slash interest rates to boost economy
description: China’s largest banks have implemented interest rate cuts for savers to stimulate economic growth and encourage consumer spending. title: PoolTogether emerges victorious as federal judge dismisses lawsuit
description: In a recent ruling, U.S. Judge Frederic Block declared that there are better venues than a federal court to address concerns regarding the decentralized finance (DeFi) platform PoolTogether. title: U.S. Congress to Sue SEC and Gary Gensler: Allowing Public Listing, Then Blocking Registration is Indefensible
description:

title: Solana Ranked as One of the Most Resilient: Messari
description:
The market intelligence firm Messari noted in a Twitter thread published earlier today that Solana (SOL) is one of the most resilient networks. According to the tweet, the firm calculated that the Solana network has an operational Nakamoto coefficient of 1.9. Messari also revealed the operational Nakamoto coefficients for Alanache (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), Near Protocol […]
